channel.title: junk on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in junk on Gabe Kangas

item.title: Obsessed with the new Blaqk Audio single
item.description: I’m completely hooked on this new Blaqk Audio single. The new album isn’t out until March, but I’m very much looking forward to it if it’s as good as this song is. Plus they’re touring, so that’s super exciting.

item.title: I will never understand people who do not enjoy psytrance
item.description: So many people think of psytrance as some lesser genre. I don’t know why. How can you not love this?

item.title: New web site is live
item.description: This new web site is now live! gabekangas.com now routes here. Good to have something new.

item.title: Diabetics are hacking their insulin pumps
item.description: This is a really cool story about people discovering an exploit in old insulin pumps that has enabled them to write software to control them, improving their quality of life.

item.title: So Gopher still is alive
item.description: I wrote a while ago about internet standards and corporate sites and mention that I wouldn’t expect anybody to go back to using Gopher or anything. Turns out people are using Gopher to host their blogs! This is so cool to me, I love the idea so much.

item.title: The removal of the legacy Roku SDK
item.description: I should have put money on this. EDIT: A previous version of this post stated that legacy visual screen components would be removed from Roku OS on January 1, 2019. While Roku still intends to remove the legacy visual screen components in a future OS update, this will not occur in January 2019. -Roku

item.title: Weight loss badge
item.description: My doctor said I needed to lose weight. So I’m giving that a shot.

item.title: Don't call me bro
item.description: I really don’t like it when people call me “bro”.
